div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 45 Thessaly, c. 1966 Burial: late 5th-early 4th cent. B.C. (Hackens) Contents: 92+ AR Pharsalus : 30 triob. Phocis: 50 triob. Aegina: 12 st. Disposition: private coll., Athens Information from T. Hackens who has record of some varieties
